Package ai.acolite.agentsdk.core.types

Interface AgentInputItem

All Known Subinterfaces:
RunItem
All Known Implementing Classes:
RunHandoffCallItem, RunHandoffOutputItem, RunItemBase, RunMessageInputItem, RunMessageOutputItem, RunReasoningItem, RunToolApprovalItem, RunToolCallItem, RunToolCallOutputItem
public interface AgentInputItem
AgentInputItem

Union of all possible input item types for agents.

JsonTypeInfo enables polymorphic serialization/deserialization: - Type information stored in "@type" property in JSON - Allows Jackson to deserialize to correct concrete class

Source: https://github.com/openai/openai-agents-js/blob/main/packages/agents-core/src/types/aliases.ts
